item.title: video scroll
item.description: html { scroll-behavior: smooth; } #video { position: fixed; height: 100vh; } .scroll-dummy { height: 3000px; max-width: 998px; padding: 20px; z-index: 1; } var FRAMES = 148; var FPS = 30; var video = document.getElementById('video'); window.addEventListener('scroll', function (e) { var time = (window.scrollY / 1000) * FRAMES / FPS; video.currentTime = time; console.log(time); }); window.addEventListener('load', function(e) { video.pause(); video.currentTime = 0; });
